name: Neron
overview: Neron is an arcade platform game. The player assumes the role of Wielgus Nogallus. The goal is to find magic artifacts in the underground of the palace of Neron. Finding all the magical items is necessary to overthrow the rule of evil Neron. Various creatures and obstacles prevent the protagonist from completing the task. Contact with the enemies and traps means a loss of energy. The main skill of Wielgus Nogallus are short and long jumps.
